docs.snippet: After Munich, we’re asking what kind of violence poses the greater danger to our self-identity: the Islamic State, or the German far right?...
docs.lead_paragraph: After Munich, we’re asking what kind of violence poses the greater danger to our self-identity: the Islamic State, or the German far right?
docs.abstract: Anna Sauerbrey Op-Ed column contends series of violent attacks in Germany have raised twin specters of global terrorism and internal right-wing extremism that have together shaken very  character of Germany; says simple truth is that while there is no easy answer to crises that threaten to destroy nation's hard-won, tolerant, cosmopolitan identity, any answer must come from Germans themselves.

headline.main: Germany, Caught Between Two Violent Extremes

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama used what is likely his last high-profile speech as president to make a powerful case for Hillary Clinton's election, saying it wasn't even a close choice between her and Donald Trump, whom he described as a homegrown demago...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama used what is likely his last high-profile speech as president to make a powerful case for Hillary Clinton's election, saying it wasn't even a close choice between her and Donald Trump, whom he described as a homegrown demagogue.

docs.snippet: By tradition, personal ambitions at the Democratic National Convention are largely unspoken, but those who are eager to break out are in attendance....
docs.lead_paragraph: By tradition, personal ambitions at the Democratic National Convention are largely unspoken, but those who are eager to break out are in attendance.
docs.abstract: Many ambitious political leaders in attendance at Democratic National Convention are looking past 2016 elections and working rooms full of party's delegates, donors and activists, all of whom will be crucial for future pursuit of any national campaign in 2020 or later.

headline.main: Democrats Discreetly Turn Attention to Presidential Prospects of the Future
headline.print_headline: A Chance for Future Stars to Emerge
